summary: This is a refurbished version of Sinderion\'s Field Laboratory. A lore friendly mod to make it look like Sinderion actually lived there.
descriptionHtml:
To use the house you have to get into Blackreach; you will then be able to use the house as you please. 


I will be adding more to this mod, I intend to add a spell that will allow you teleport there with an alteration spell ( I would already have this done but I am a noob at making mods so I have no idea what to do). I also want to create a small quest to obtain this spell before hand so you can get reep the benefits of this house early on in you game. I will take any request or advice into consideration.
author: aciebunch1313
